channel.title: Casket rewards [delta]
channel.description:
iv got the right coding to enable a player to recieve a reward from a casket however im not sure where to put it as i was told to put it in client.java under case 122 but that makes bones give the same reward aswell does anybody know where to put it???
cheers :)
